home.headline: Design engineer and builder
home.subline: I'm Tung Mai, a Full Stack Developer. I create beautiful, functional websites and applications that solve real-world problems.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Tung is a Hanoi-based full stack developer with a passion for creating innovative web and mobile applications. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, Tung excels at building seamless user experiences and robust functionality. When not coding, Tung enjoys exploring the latest tech trends and contributing to open-source projects.

Freelancer.achievements: Spearheaded the development of a scalable e-commerce platform that increased user engagement by 30%.;Implemented a microservices architecture that improved system reliability and reduced downtime by 25%.

Kuky.achievements: Successfully launch the Kuky app on both iOS and Android platforms

Emddi.achievements: Lead a mobile development team to optimize Emddi app

React-Native.description: Building cross-platform mobile apps with React-Native.

Backend.description: Experience with Node.js, Django, Nextjs for server-side development.

Frontend.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React.js and Next.js.

IOT.description: Knowledge of IoT protocols and platforms for connected devices.
